name: Shadow's Echo (Browser Version) 0.1.2
description:
Newest update: 7/1/19, version 0.1.2

One year after a world-spanning war, six heroes reunite.

Old wounds reopen, and tales best forgotten are shared once again.

As Raldin - a stoic guide who once traveled with these heroes - you will discover secrets both old and new as you reconnect and reminisce with your old companions.

This is the browser playable version of my visual novel, Shadow's Echo. Please check out the game's main page for details and devlogs, and to leave questions or comments about the game.

Please note: If you are running this on mobile, you will need to tap the screen with two fingers to access the menu/back out of menus.
